name: the Longest Hunt_ver. 2
description:
In-Development

Survive the cold. Gather berries while you attempt to stay warm. You are a hunter tasked with gathering berries for their tribe to make medicine. The cold is fierce, so time is of the essence.

Controls: WASD to move, Space to jump

Collect 8 berries and explore the area.

12-15-2022: Uploaded version 2! Added a basic animation for flavor, some ambiance, and balanced some of the warmth mechanics. Enjoy!:3
